title: [Large-scale] Experiential Learning Program in Science Through Virtual Business Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and team project experience
context.additional_context: Applied science projects conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance problem-solving skills through virtual projects that integrate scientific theories with business requirements.
Complete at least three feedback cycles utilizing team collaboration and communication skills.
Develop personalized progress reports based on learning analytics and establish improvement strategies.
Demonstrate creativity and critical thinking by applying scientific knowledge to real-world business scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
